data.what_is: Imaginit Technologies is a provider of design and engineering solutions to the building, manufacturing, and infrastructure industries.

initial_reviews.review_content:
We regularly use Imaginit Technologies to help us purchase software. They help recommend the correct type of software for our company and how many seats we need for our team. They are knowledgeable about implementing software and recommending training or support for our team. They provide excellent feedback and follow up with us throughout the year, giving us lots of notice when it is time to renew our software licensing and take the time to explain any difference with the new contracts. Their website has a lot of resouces and tutorials that are useful and relavent to our company


They are consistent and keep in touch with us throughout the year, not just when it is time to renew. Provide many resources on their website and offer good training in the software they provide.


I have a hard time keeping track of who our current representative is as it seems to change a lot almost mulitiple times a year. In the past, we had a direct connection with a sales representative that visited us and kept in touch with us throughout the year. She had an excellent understanding of our business and wanted to offer us the best solutions. It is a shame we don't have that kind of relationship with our new representative.


They provide a lot of knowledge and resources about the software that would be best suited to your industry and team. They offer resources and training on their website with many webcasts, tutorials and blog posts.


They have helped us choose the right software and figure out how many licenses are appropriate for the size of the team we have. They offered us help and problem-solving for implementing the server aspect of our software and for when we haven't upgraded our software to the latest version in a few years and needed to do a multistep process of different version installations to get our software up and running the latest version.

residential projects, average 10 levels.


automation would be the best, then the variety of other apps from toolbar Utilities


the complexity for a new user that might damage files if not properly trained.


Contact Jamey Dempsey, he will assist anytime from anywhere so solve your issues.


Time saver, reducing the need to hire interns to run time consuming simple tasks.

It helps automate some mundane tasks we need to fix in our drawings - such and data entry/


I like that I can pull in files from excel SOMEWHAT easily, and I love the simple change case tool.


I wish it could be more integrated with excel - as in i could work directly in the excel file while im in revit...like a cloud based system.


Within Revit the product functions properly. If there are certain model maintenance issues you need to address and imaginit has them - it is a smooth tool to work with to solve those issues.


Room data entry in Revit can be easier to change when I use the excel files.

Using Clarity to automate tasks


Ease of use in setting up tasks to automate processes.  We have saved hours of time automating tasks that previously were manually.


Some features that would make sense currently missing


Spend the time to read the documentation to understand setting up tasks.


Automating repetitive tasks.  Our employees can now automate the tasks that considered boring and can now focus on work that is more enjoyable.
